abilities.desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.
abilities.name: Earth Spike
abilities.notes: The spikes move at 1800 units per second.

abilities.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.
abilities.name: Hex
abilities.notes: The target will have a base movement speed of 120, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.

abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.
abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.notes: Instantly destroys illusions and prevents heroes from going invisible.

abilities.desc: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.
abilities.name: Finger of Death
abilities.notes: Finger of Death only gains damage if the enemy hero dies within 3 seconds of being affected by Finger of Death.
